features: Liquid Ceramic is a new and unique, wipe-on screen protector that bonds to the glass of your device offering enhanced scratch and shatter resistance with an added oleophobic feature that restores and improves the anti-fingerprint properties of the glass surface by improving it’s water and oil repellency resulting in smoother touch and easier to clean surface.
Adds a super thin layer of invisible glass, increases its strength to 9 H hardness level.

Restores the screen’s original coating and improves it beyond new for an excellent and high clarity screen that is smooth to touch and extremely responsive (should not be applied to a broken screen. Does Not fix or repair existing damages).
Easy, bubble free wipe-on application with a universal fit; ideal for curved screens and tablets.
Universal: Compatible with all mobile devices, phones, tablets and smart watches, cameras, touch screens. 100% Compatible with fingerprint readers or sensors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TOP TIER PROTECTION LIQUID CERAMIC is a new and unique, wipe-on screen protector that bonds to the glass of your device offering enhanced scratch and shatter resistance with an added advanced oleophobic feature that restores and improves the anti-fingerprint properties of the glass surface by improving it’s water and oil repellency resulting in smoother touch and easier to clean surface. LIQUID CERAMIC universal screen protection is compatible with all mobile devices including phones, tablets, smart watches and other gadgets with glass screens.

HOW DOES IT WORK? LIQUID CERAMIC adds a super thin layer of invisible glass, increases its strength to 9 H hardness level, and offers enhanced fingerprint, scratch and impact resistance. What makes LIQUID CERAMIC different than traditional liquid screen protectors, besides it’s improved scratch and shatter resistance is, it’s ability to restore the screen’s original coating and improving it beyond new for an excellent and high clarity screen that is smooth to touch and extremely responsive. At microscopic level, the glass of your device is not as smooth as it seems. It's imperfect with gaps and pores. This porous surface creates points of weakness when exposed to sharp objects or impacts. LIQUID CERAMIC fills in the microscopic pores and coats the surface with an additional super thin layer of glass, resulting in stronger and more scratch resistant surface.

SCRATCH RESISTANT LIQUID CERAMIC adds a super thin layer of invisible glass, increases its strength to 9 H hardness level. Protects your device's screen against regular scratches that may happen with regular use. Please note: It will not fix existing scratches and will not make your screen completely scratch-proof. SHATTER RESISTANT LIQUID CERAMIC fills in the microscopic pores and coats the surface with an additional super thin layer of glass, resulting in stronger and more scratch resistant surface. Protects your device's screen against occasional drops that may occur with regular use. Please note: it will not make your screen completely shatter-proof. FINGERPRINT RESISTANT LIQUID CERAMIC restores the screen’s original coating, improving it beyond new for an excellent and high clarity screen that is smooth to touch, extremely responsive and easy to clean. Reduces smudges, oil marks and fingerprints on your screen. Please note it does not make the screen completely fingerprint-proof.

UNIVERSAL LIQUID CERAMIC is compatible with all smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, eyewear, cameras, lenses and touch screens. Excellent for curved screens and foldable screens as well. 100% FINGERPRINT READER COMPATIBLE LIQUID CERAMIC is 100% compatible with fingerprint scanners, face recognition, screen lock and cameras. It would not affect or interfere with any fingerprint readers. CRYSTAL CLEAR LIQUID CERAMIC fills in the microscopic gaps and smoothes out the glass surface resulting in crystal clear screen.

SUPER EASY APPLICATION: APPLY Clean all glass surfaces thoroughly with the cleaning wipe supplied in Sachet 1. Apply LIQUID CERAMIC liquid screen protector: Open the vial's cap and drip a few drops. Use the dry wipe supplied to apply. WAIT Allow the glass surface to cure for a minimum of 10 minutes (ideally 30+ minutes). The longer you let it cure without touching the better. The screen can be touched after 10 minutes however, glass surface will continue curing for the next 24 hours. BUFF Use the microfiber cloth supplied to buff out and remove any excess residues from the glass surface and to give it an excellent shine. Your screen is now protected with LIQUID CERAMIC

WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE? (WHY SHOULD YOU CHOOSE LIQUID CERAMIC) Unlike traditional liquid screen protectors, LIQUID CERAMIC does NOT need to be re-applied every 1-3 months. The unique formula lasts up to two years while it's recommended to re-apply once per year.LIQUID CERAMIC features unique and advanced oleophobic ability to restore the screen’s original coating for improved fingerprint, oil and smudge resistance.LIQUID CERAMIC screen protector can cover up to 4 devices LIQUID CERAMIC does not interfere with fingerprint sensors Premium grade only. NOT old technology that were designed to be used for ceramic coatings and windshield coatings, LIQUID CERAMIC is specifically formulated for mobile device screens and produced with cutting-edge technology. LIQUID CERAMIC is UNIVERSAL and compatible with all mobile devices, phones, smart watches and tablets. LIQUID CERAMIC is a USA, New York and California based brand offering premium products since a decade. DOES IT INTERFERE WITH FINGERPRINT READERS? Not at all. LIQUID CERAMIC is 100% compatible fingerprint readers/sensors. CAN A TEMPERED GLASS BE USED ON TOP OF LIQUID CERAMIC? Yes. Once LIQUID CERAMIC is applied, dried and buffed it's safe to apply a tempered glass on top. CAN LIQUID CERAMIC CAUSE ANY DAMAGE TO MY DEVICE? No. It has been tested vigorously and proven not to cause any damages to the device. HOW OFTEN DO I NEED TO APPLY LIQUID CERAMIC? It may last up tp two years but it's recommended to re-apply once a year. HOW I APPLY ADDITIONAL LAYERS OF LIQUID CERAMIC? Yes, multiple layers can be applied as desired. SELECT FROM THE 4 OPTIONS BELOW:

LIQUID CERAMIC Screen Protector LIQUID CERAMIC with USD 200 Coverage LIQUID CERAMIC with USD 300 Coverage LIQUID CERAMIC with USD 400 Coverage Protection Coverage 0 USD 200 (one device) USD 300 (one device) USD 400 (one device) Form bottle wipe wipe wipe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great screen protector
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy it is to use! It holds up nicely and prevents scratches. My husband works on a golf course and he is constantly throwing his phone on the dashboard of the golf cart with no scratches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well especially to keep screen clean
reviews.reviewText: I am not sure how much harder the screen is now (more resistant to scratching) but it is definitely a lot smoother to the touch and stays cleaner for longer.Update: my screen has a few scratches, which I thought were in the glass, but after reapplying about 3 drops the scratches were gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Won't make your phone screen shatterproof, WILL reduce fingerprints & smudges
reviews.reviewText: I have a Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra. Pretty big phone. Always getting fingerprints and smudges on the screen, always cleaning it off with some spray solution and a microfiber cloth. I used this stuff and noticed a difference right away. The screen has that just-cleaned smooth slickness and mirror shine for longer and doesn't require as much cleaning as often. It still gets some prints and smudges, though, so this isn't some magic cure for that problem. If you do any mobile gaming and require a smooth, glossy surface for your fingers to move smoothly across the screen, this is for you. This will help with that. As long as you follow the instructions and let the product cure for 10 minutes (I would give it a little more just to be safe) you should be good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: Easy directions and seems to work as intended. There's noticeably less fingerprints on my screen compared to without. When I purchased my phone two years ago, the Verizon rep applied liquid glass on my phone, which is comparable but much more expensive. I'm glad I found this and opted for the one without the warranty because I have insurance that would cover the issues if they happen. It allowed me 4 coats, double coating both mine and another phone. There's probably another application that it can do for a tablet or alike. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing product & has saved my phone! Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product OK. Their headline is deceptive. THREE kits inside, not four as stated.
reviews.reviewText: Product applies easily following directions. I do question its actual ability to protect as it's basically like a very watery liquid car wax. Their headline "up to 4 devices" is not accurate and scammy - the kit only has three applications inside so following their directions you cannot do four. C'mon just be accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only stuff I use
reviews.reviewText: Never had a scratch on my screen by dropping my phone or pointing in my pocket. Use with phone case

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worse than Nothing
reviews.reviewText: I had a small scratch on my screen and read that this might fill the scratch and make it look better, it didn't. The scratch is no more or less visible. In the weeks since applying the liquid protection I now have hundreds of micro scratches all over my screen that I never had from normal use. If I could go back in time I would not buy this product.
